g:HTMLPanel.p: Erika Ray began her musical studies with the violin and switched to the piano at age 11. Between 11 and 14 Erika worked as an accompanist, composed the score to the school musical, and was awarded the National Level rating in the Piano Guild. Erika was a featured performer at the Heidelberg Music Festival in 1999. After working as an accompanist and piano teacher in Colorado Springs, Erika relocated to Denver to continue her musical studies.
Tamara Goldstein. Erika is involved in solo piano, chamber music, and accompanying. Her upcoming recital in May 2013 will feature left hand piano repertoire and a world premiere left hand piece.

Erika is the lead accompanist at St. Mary's Catholic Church in Littleton, Colorado under the direction of Dr. Marcia Marchesi. She also is active in local performances including opera and music theater. Erika is very excited to be working with local performance groups, and if you are in need of an accompanist, please contact for rates.

Erika loves teaching and sharing music with her students. Her teaching style is friendly and patient and she strives to help each of her students find their own musical voice. Erika is experienced working with both children and adults, and caters each lesson to help each student achieve their goals. Her private teaching studio recently celebrated its two year anniversary with a recital full of happy students!
